content:
I would like to kindly inform you about ERA-NET cofund CHIST-ERA, to be published in December 2020.
Researchers and the professional community now have the opportunity to define selected specific research topics by actively participating in the activities of the CHIST-ERA 2020 online conference held from September 29 to October 1, 2020.

Topics of the call 2020 (info https://www.chistera.eu/call-2020-draft-topics-keywords):
• Advanced Brain-Computer Interfaces for Novel Interactions
• Towards Sustainable ICT

Submission of abstracts by September 11. (list of already proved abstracts: https://www.chistera.eu/conference/abstracts/2020).

Conference registration: https://www.chistera.eu/call-2020-draft-topics-keywords.
